Params: {1: 'Final Exhibition', 2: 'Chapter 3', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory.png'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Miss Luna is already here. Are you all ready?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Of course! I've even left a little gift for our guests from Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "You're playing around again."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "We all have our passions, do we not, Mr. Gabriel? I just don't have such a lofty and delicate one like yours.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Machines, Constructs, Humans, Punishing Virus, whatever comes of this ragged doll of a world, I have no interest...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I exist to protect Miss Luna and ensure her wishes are fulfilled. That is all.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg204_1.jpg'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Please... please... let us in the Ascension-Network...'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Please share with us the power of Miss Luna...'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'And relieve us of the Punishing Virus...'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'How naive... Only by embracing and accepting it, are you fit to control the power of the Punishing Virus.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'To wish for relief—you have already lost your chance.'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Ugh...'}
{3: 'Roland swings his weapon, and the Corrupted is quickly split into two halves.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "To join the core of Ascnet and be bestowed Miss Luna's power, you will have to prove yourself—"}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Prove that you are crueler... more dreadful... and deadlier... than the virus.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Only so, are you fit to become the owner of the virus, do you understand?'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'The owner of the... virus...'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Become the... owner!'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'There will be a band of humans coming here soon. Use this opportunity to prove yourself to Miss Luna.'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Humans...'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Destroy... humans! Destroy... humans!'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Roland.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Yes, milady?'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Please don't fool around too long with my sister and her friends. You know you have better things to do than that."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Of course! Among those hypocritical and disorganized humans, I'll find an appropriate..."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Seed...'}
